text: Sink the ship to the bottom of the sea, if necessary, until the keel rests on the black sand of the bottom, in the midst of darkness and silence. There is a risk that the ship will not float again. But if he comes back, in his forest, entangled in the sharks, there will be mermaids. FIN Falsifications, 1966
title: Pesca de sirenas
author: Marco Denevi
